availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James L. Burns (Morgan County, Illinois, farmer.)

body.p: Morgan County, Illinois, farmer. Tennessee native. Son of Harvey Burns and Jane Burns. Resident of Carter County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Morgan County, Illinois, in 1860. Attended school in Morgan County in 1860. Killed by Robert Pulliam in Morgan County on July 24, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Carter County, District 7, p. 196B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Morgan County, Franklin Precinct, p. 646.
KYR-0001-006-0040.
